title: Track Work Order Progress
description: A production supervisor wants to check the progress of a specific high-priority work order.

tasks.description: Find the work order using its ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the details for the specified work order.

tasks.description: Review the completed operations and the current location of the work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reports that 3 of 5 operations are complete and the job is at the 'Assembly' work center.

tasks.description: Estimate the completion time based on the remaining operations and standard cycle times.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an estimated completion date and time.
